Our Facilities

Modern Healthcare Infrastructure

Explore our well-equipped facilities designed to provide the best healthcare experience for patients in Makueni County.

Kalawa Health Center Healthcare Facility

Our main hospital building houses all major departments and services, providing comprehensive healthcare to the Kalawa ward and surrounding communities.

Facility Features

Inside Our Healthcare Facility

Modern Examination Rooms
Well-equipped examination rooms with the latest medical equipment for comprehensive patient care.
  • Digital equipment
  • Comfortable environment
  • Privacy assured
  • Sterile conditions
Surgical Theater
State-of-the-art surgical facilities with qualified medical staff for various medical procedures.
  • Modern surgical equipment
  • Sterile environment
  • Qualified staff
  • Emergency ready
Medical Ward
Dedicated patient care areas with professional medical staff providing comprehensive treatment.
  • Patient monitoring
  • Professional care
  • Comfortable beds
  • 24/7 supervision
Patient Waiting Areas
Comfortable and accessible waiting areas designed with patient comfort and convenience in mind.
  • Comfortable seating
  • Covered walkways
  • Easy accessibility
  • Clean environment
Hospital Campus
Our welcoming hospital buildings are designed to serve the community with easy access and modern facilities.
  • Modern architecture
  • Accessible design
  • Community-focused
  • Well-maintained grounds

Visit Us

Find Us in Kalawa Ward

Located in the heart of Kalawa ward, Mbooni constituency, our facility is easily accessible to serve the healthcare needs of Makueni County residents.
